products.title: Cordoba Blackout Purple Roller Blind
products.description: The deep purple tone here is one of warmth, its a stylish colour somewhere between dark blackcurrant and lighter grape, it has depth but isnt too vibrant or loud. This blackout roller blind will add a sophisticated note to a bedroom or maybe a cosy look in a bathroom.

products.title: Ahoy Indigo Roller Blind
products.description: Let your children escape to the sea with their entertaining and sweet ahoy indigo roller blind from the sanderson home collection. The magical sea adventure is beautifully captured and shows pirate boats, dolphins, birds and swords. It is bound to put a smile on your children let your children escape to the sea with their entertaining and sweet ahoy indigo roller blind from the sanderson home collection.

products.title: Polka Dot Purple Roller Blind
products.description: A sweet take on one of emma bridgewaters most treasured designs, this polka dot purple roller blind will have your home popping with colour in no time. Like a bag of pick and mix, this colourful pattern is full of candy tones and sugary delights.

products.title: Fretwork Indigo Roller Blind
products.description: With a fretwork indigo roller blind in your window, your home will feel wonderfully modern yet cosy at the same time, with a relaxed geometric print in a smooth colourway. The pattern doesnt overwhelm a room; instead it decorates it with a soft pattern that oozes charm and ch with a fretwork indigo roller blind in your window, your home will feel wonderfully modern yet cosy at the same time, with a relaxed geometric print in a smooth colourway.

products.title: Choices Leyton Royal Purple Roller Blind
products.description: Give your home a gentle lift with this delicate choices leyton royal purple roller blind. Full of texture, this rich purple colour is highlighted with lighter threads. With a choice of linings, you can tailor this blind to your needs, making it practical as well as stylish and t give your home a gentle lift with this delicate choices leyton royal purple roller blind.

Say hello to a blind like no other.

products.title: Leaf Indigo Roller Blind
products.description: Deep, dark blue is brought together with finely detailed and oversized leaves, a combination that its quite remarkable. This leaf indigo roller blind is part of their harlequin additions collection, oozing sophistication and a whole lot of designer flair, no matter where you hang deep, dark blue is brought together with finely detailed and oversized leaves, a combination that its quite remarkable.

products.title: Sumi Indigo Roller Blind
products.description: Harlequin certainly don't design patterns that shrink into the background. In fact, they thrive off the bold and show-stopping. And this certainly shows with the sumi indigo roller blind.
